name: Cookie Cranker (ALPHA)
description:
A port of cookie clicker for the Playdate!

here’s the source: https://github.com/TotsIsTots/Cookie-Cranker

Download directly links to the build on Github, so it is updated with every commit I make!

Installation

If sideloading over the website does not work, uncompress and recompress the zip file. If this also does not work, sideload with Data Disk Mode. Instructions for this can be found here. Of course, the file must be unzipped for Data Disk Mode.

Changelog

v0.2.1 Added game card 5/26/22

v0.2.0 Added saving! 5/26/22
